wikipedia_page.main:
Craig Scott Strachan (born 19 May 1982) is a Scottish retired professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder for Coventry City and Rochdale in the Football League.
He is the son of Gordon Strachan.

response: Strachan was named as FWA Footballer of the Year for the 1990–91 season while at Leeds. He was also named Manager of the Year in Scotland several times by writers and players while at Celtic. In 2007, Strachan was inducted into the Scottish Football Hall of Fame. He is the father of Craig Strachan and Gavin Strachan, also footballers.
* Craig Strachan (hockey) (born 1971), Scottish ice hockey and field hockey player
* Gordon Strachan, Gavin Strachan (son), Craig Strachan (son)
